title: YouTube : all-time beauty content category views 2017
yAxis: Amount of category views in billions
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount of category views in billions for 9 number of Selected Cosmeticss.
The Amount of category views in billions is highest at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and lowest at Selected Cosmetics Nails.
There is a difference of 215.0 between the maximum Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and minimum Selected Cosmetics Nails.
